name: Great Job Commissioner
description:
It is a truth universally acknowledged that the Commissioner is doing a great job. As Intern-Interim Blaseball Commissioner Prime Minister Parker, it's your job to ensure that this truism remains true. Or else.

Inspired by Blaseball and the Reigns games. All icons from game-icons.net. Works better full-screened.

Known Issues: If you go past day 99 then a) congratulations you've played more than I ever thought anyone would and b) the day counter will be a bit busted. Don't worry, nothing is broken apart from the display, I'll fix it when I'm less tired.
